website_summaries.verdict: Excellent value with three pairs of sock in the set. Can wear these socks with almost any kind of footwear.
pros: These socks help with foot, ankle, and lower leg pain
Socks provide a bit of grip when walking or exercising without shoes
Customers like how these socks help with swelling in feet
cons: Customers with sensitive feet say they feel seam in the socks, which is uncomfortable

customer_reviews.title: Relieved Foot Pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on a whim to try and reduce some arch pain that I have been having with one foot. I have terrible pain first thing in the morning and then sometimes during the day from wearing flat shoes. I was surprised when it worked even better than I could have imagined. I wear the sock at night only, but I've already noticed reduced arch pain when I wake up and when I'm working during the day. I wear the sock when exercising, but otherwise don't have any foot pain all day long any more!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks! My second purchase, I’m always looking for socks. I walk for a living, I work at a casino. I walk up and down floors (4 of them) for 8 hours. For the last six months I have been dealing with the plantar fasciitis, plus roll over from my ankle, these socks seem to help a lot for me. Did I say I love them?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for swelling feet!
customer_reviews.text: For several weeks, my feet and ankles were swelling. I could not for the life of me figure out what the problem was, so I conclude that it must have been a circulation problem and I also was diagnosed with plantar fasciitis. I knew I needed these socks if for nothing else but the PF. The compression socks were the answer to the swelling I had in my feet and ankles and have been great support for the PF.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Green

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are comfortable, supportive without cutting off circulation and they look and feel great. My feet have not felt this great in years. Thank you for a great product. No I did not receive anything for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I could not wear them in shoes as they created pain where the sock ended on my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: These are so good I bought them twice!
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic pain in my foot that needs support so I can walk comfortably. I bought several brands to try them out and these won my choice. Good product reasonable priced.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L Gray

customer_reviews.title: Size runs a little small but overall they're great. I don't use mine for plantar fasciitis like ...
customer_reviews.text: Size runs a little small but overall they're great. I don't use mine for plantar fasciitis like others, I bought mine for post walking boot support for an ankle injury and so far so good. They give me just a bit more support while I'm still wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Queen of the Freaking Universe

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: I just got them so I don’t know if they will actually help however they are comfortable, soft and I like how you can wear them under or on top of another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Misty/Chris

customer_reviews.title: shoes
customer_reviews.text: If you use these while sleeping, they are great. If you use them while home, walking around without shoes, great. Once you wear shoes, very uncomfortable. The band around your foot is way too thick and bunches in the shoe. You feel the thick band with every step. I need the support while I walk around in shoes! These do not do it!
customer_reviews.author: Nathanael Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great support socks
customer_reviews.text: Both of my ankles have arthritis and the Ankle Support Compression Socks really help support and have less pain.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: These socks are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Recently received my order and started wearing these socks. I am very pleased with this purchase! I've noticed a big difference already. These socks have alleviated the pain in my very sore heels. I highly recommend this product. Not only a very good price, but they do work!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica I.

customer_reviews.title: not tight enough?
customer_reviews.text: These don't feel real tight on my feet. I have a pair bought from the foot aisle at a local walmart that fit tighter...but I guess I don't know for sure if it should be the tighter one?? I just know the tighter one feels better after a bit?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price
customer_reviews.text: Good product, good price. Not quite as snug as others I have purchased. Difficult to wear under socks as they bunch up. Still, good price and they do work.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher B.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: made my feet feel better, but my toes still ache really bad when I walk
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I got them on time and they are a good quality material
customer_reviews.text: They are way to big for my small feet and I ordered the small size making this worthless to me. I'm sure if they had fit they would have given relief to my aching feet. On the plus side, I got them on time and they are a good quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Rankin Carson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom. She has been having feet issue with arthritis and they have been helping her lots. I will buy these again when she needs them. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: L Covarrubias

customer_reviews.title: Its working for me
customer_reviews.text: Plantar Fasciitis socks work I am glad I bought them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are a lifesaver! I am on my feet ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a lifesaver! I am on my feet all day at work and having Plantar Fasciitis the pain is unbearable BUT I sleep in these every night and I SWEAR they’ve helped heal my feet!
customer_reviews.author: HeathaG

customer_reviews.title: Fits fight
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 brands and these give the most compression of the three brands
customer_reviews.author: psyco24

customer_reviews.title: while I liked the quality of these
customer_reviews.text: while I liked the quality of these, I found they did nothing to help the problem for which I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: I love that this was a 3 pack
customer_reviews.text: I work in a hospital, and I bought these socks so that my feet wouldn't continue to hurt. I actually wear them outside of work now, too. I love that this was a 3 pack; it was definitely the best deal!
customer_reviews.author: Mara Thrasher

customer_reviews.title: worth it, good value
customer_reviews.text: very nice fit. keeps good compression on ankle. I like the feel of the sock. It washes well.
customer_reviews.author: SU SANG

customer_reviews.title: Have used for multiple weeks and still happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Sized as expected. I wear about an 8 and the small fit well. They wash well and color/appearance stayed well so far. Have used for multiple weeks and still happy with them. Considering purchasing another set soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sharpe09

customer_reviews.title: Very supportive
customer_reviews.text: These fit great and feel good. They help relieve some of the pain from plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Morrisey

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Work really well for my feet. Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too much pressure on my foot, ended up hurting it more than without.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I bought them for my ankles and they work great
customer_reviews.author: Denise Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Foot pain due to pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: I've been dealing with foot pain since I got pregnant with my son. These have helped with pain relief in my arches! I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Bjohn

customer_reviews.title: I suffered from peripheral neuropathy in my feet caused by ...
customer_reviews.text: I suffered from peripheral neuropathy in my feet caused by side effects from chemotherapy treatments for breast cancer. My feet didn't hurt as badly after a full day of work.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I couldn't even walk barefoot in my house. I put these on and my feet do not hurt .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have these in pink from a different order but same brand, however these 3 pair aren't nearly as tight as my original pair. These fit like a normal sock, so for compression purposes, they're pretty pointless. And although I bought a size S/M, they're long, like basically covering my toes (I wear a 7.5/8 in women's shoes), and my other pair stop just before the toes which is what I prefer. I'm going to keep them for the tiniest bit of compression that they do provide, but I definitely wouldn't order them again. They don't do much of anything for my plantar fasciitis or my swollen ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda M

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Really helps me run longer & my feet are less achy afterwards. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie D.

customer_reviews.title: Not very supportive
customer_reviews.text: Unraveled quickly and the band around the foot bunched no matter what I did. I am disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: fit perfect just hard to wear under a pair of socks
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for small feet.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for compression for swelling ankles. They work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Judith M. Roy

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing! 3 pair for $20 was a steal
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! 3 pair for $20 was a steal! Love the colors, and that I can wear them with flip flops.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: ... pain since receiving my socks and I spend a good amount of time on my feet
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed less pain since receiving my socks and I spend a good amount of time on my feet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality of sock was good.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t help, but didn’t hurt either. Quality of sock was good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and protective!
customer_reviews.text: I have broken my foot 4 times, which makes it difficult for me to run or even walk for too long. Any repetitive pressure can break it again. I bought these due to the way they protect the foot. I am so glad I did. I usually have to wrap my foot before I run or walk a lot. With these I don’t have to wrap my foot. I just slide them on and it holds my bones in place, provides cushion for my feet and they are really comfortable. I plan on ordering another set for my friend who has plantar fasciitis. I know she will love them, too!!
customer_reviews.author: L K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely satisfied with the sleeves I got from these guys. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Will be returning.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these seem like a steal. Until you try them... There were lose threads at the bottom before I even used the black pair. I just put one of the whites on for the first time and it's noticibly larger than the black. Is that where the s/m comes in? One is a small, another is a medium? The white one also only feels compressed at the toe end and feels very thin in the heel. No support where I actually need it. I gave 2 stars for price and the fact that the black pair offered some support, just not great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: These felt great while wearing them
customer_reviews.text: These felt great while wearing them. Still give some support yet as the time goes by they are getting looser and looser with less compression.
customer_reviews.author: smileznhugz

customer_reviews.title: would be good if
customer_reviews.text: Too big for my size 6 feet, would be good if tighter
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I went small, and they were still loose. No compression at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No compression!
customer_reviews.text: I am going to try and return these as they have almost no compression. I purchased another brand at the same time and they are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Linda T

customer_reviews.title: Great socks, recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give these a try before writing my review. At first they felt like regular socks on me. I have small thin feet and I didn't really feel any compression. But, I've worn them all day long and slept in them and now I feel the difference. I have had numerous problems with my feet and ankles so now I am blessed with soreness and swelling. My feet definitely feel great and the normal swelling is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Hanba

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative!
customer_reviews.text: I have edema in my feet pretty regularly. Summer is here and knee high compression socks are just to much right now. I wanted something a little more forgiving so I thought I'd give these a try. Their great, the only complaint/issue is the photos look like they provide more coverage than they actually do. They don't cover yo the toes and up the ankle, it's one or the other. Also k would gave likes all black as an option but that's just me.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal B

customer_reviews.title: These really have lots of compresson
customer_reviews.text: They have lasted a long time for me, and have strong compresson.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kline

customer_reviews.title: They're okay
customer_reviews.text: They feel a bit loose. I just thought they would fit a little tighter considering they are compression socks. Nice colors though.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Works for plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Great product but not as durable and strong as some of the others I've seen. They definitely help with my plantar fasciitis so I can't complain, but the socks are a bit on the thin side but still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Simone S. Pleines

customer_reviews.title: Helps wearing indoors on barefoot and helps under regular
customer_reviews.text: Helps wearing indoors on barefoot and helps under regular socks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Horrid strings on the inside and an aweful seem on the ball of foot that makes them in wearable.
customer_reviews.author: UnicornMom

customer_reviews.title: Support
customer_reviews.text: Wore when traveling and really helped with ankle swelling! Would love them with full foot coverage instead I’d open toe
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Archer

product_meta.title: Plantar Fasciitis Socks with Arch Support (3 Pair) Compression Sock for Women & Men, Ease Swelling & Heel Spurs, Ankle Brace Support, Fast Pain Relief - S/M
feature_bullets: ✅ 100% MONEY-BACK SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – We thought of everything when designing this 3 Pairs Foot Sleeve Combo Pack in 3 different colors to ensure that you'd love it! Your satisfaction is our top priority; because we believe in the quality of our products, we think you should be given the chance to try us out without any risk. That's why we're able to back it up with Our No Risk 100% Unconditional Money Back Guarantee (No Questions Asked)

✅ FOOT COMPRESSION RELIEF SLEEVES TECHNOLOGY – Our Engineered foot sleeves bundle pack provide superior relief of plantar fasciitis, heel spurs, ankle/arch support and foot pain. Reduce blood pooling and banish discomfort. Help with Achilles tendonitis, edema relief & heel pain. Can be worn after a rigorous activity to help your feet recover & reduce swelling & soreness in the foot, ankle & lower leg

✅ FAST RECOVERY AND GRADUATED COMPRESSION – Unlike other sleeves in the market, our bundled sleeves apply graduated pressure (15-25 mmHg) with their snug fit design & improve blood circulation by reducing lactic acid build up & provide optimal comfort & help improve muscular endurance. Designed to boost circulation and faster muscle recovery after tough training, traveling & long days on your feet

✅ SUPER PREMIUM QUALITY SOFT & FLEXIBLE MATERIAL – Designed for comfort and ultra-durability. The sleeves are made up of superior quality and hygienic fabric that is quick at deodorizing & keeping you dry & comfortable even with longer use. The inner texture of the fabric gives you a cozy and soft to touch feel. Available in two sizes: S/M & L/XL and for MEN and WOMEN alike

✅ ATHLETE APPROVED AND DOCTOR RECOMMENDED – These high performance foot sleeves are optimally designed for everyday use. Wear our product for running, jumping, or anything in between for superior ankle, foot and heel support. They offer flexibility and can be worn with shoes, flip flops, sandals or under normal socks with office wear, casual or sportswear. And are Machine Washable
